page.title: 10FORESTRY
page.content: The second most important industry in this area is{Forestry}. Most of the land around{Hurn}is sandstone and as such is of little value to arable or dairy farmers. The{Forestry Commission}plants pine trees on{Ramsdown,}and on{Sopley {Common.}Pine trees grow very quickly and can therefore be used as a profitable crop. The local population and tourists enjoy using the plantations as areas for recreation and leisure. Walks have been created through the trees and good views of the area can be obtained from the top of{Ramsdown Hill.} In the north_west corner of our block there are several camping areas and a small part of{Hurn Airport} encroaches into the Forestry Commissions plantations.
